name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-telemetry-event-sender-sample
title: Telemetry Event Sender Web Part
shortDescription: SPFx React web part that sends telemetry events via CustomEvent to a tenant-wide telemetry Application Customizer.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates a React-based SPFx web part that emits telemetry events through the browser CustomEvent API (`spfx-telemetry`).
It is designed to work together with a tenant-wide Application Customizer that listens for these events and forwards them to Azure Application Insights or an Azure Function endpoint.
The web part showcases configurable scenario metadata, importance levels, and a simple UI to trigger sample telemetry events.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
